September 30, 1954
Mr, Frank JE, Schooley, Chairman
Radio Program Planning Committee
National Association of Educational Broadcasters
227 Gregory Hall
University of Illinois
Urbana, Illinois
Dear Frank:
Parker and I will both be at the committee meeting 2 to 5 p.m.
Tuesday, October 26.
I look forward to seeing you then.
Best regards.
gepieth
Sincerely yours,
George JE. Probst
Director of Programs
